token."}},"getBorrowApy()":{"returns":{"apy":"Borrow APY in basis points (e.g. 450 = 4.5%)."}},"getSupplyApy()":{"returns":{"apy":"Supply APY in basis points (e.g. 250 = This will increase your debt"},"collateralOf(address)":{"notice":"Check how many EGGS tokens a user has as collateral"},"debtOf(address)":{"notice":"Check how much S a user has borrowed"},"eggsToken()":{"notice":"Get the EGGS token contract address"},"getBorrowApy()":{"notice":"Get the interest rate for borrowing S. Above 1.0 is safe, below 1.0 might get liquidated"},"mintEggs(uint256)":{"notice":"Convert S tokens into EGGS tokens. Approve this adapter to spend your S first. Note: Eggs charges a minting fee (like 2.5%)"},"redeemEggs(uint256)":{"notice":"Convert EGGS tokens back to S tokens 1:1. Make sure to approve this adapter to spend your EGGS first"},"repayS(uint256)":{"notice":"Pay back borrowed S tokens to reduce your debt. Only pays back up to the amount you actually owe"}},"notice":"Interface for working with Eggs Finance. Lets you mint EGGS tokens from S, use EGGS as collateral to borrow more S, and redeem EGGS back to S. Also handles debt repayment and balance checking Eggs Finance on Sonic lets you create leveraged yield positions by staking S to mint EGGS (with a fee), then using those EGGS to borrow more S. You can reinvest the borrowed S into yield farms like Shadow or BEETS. This adapter makes it easy for strategies to use Eggs contracts","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/interfaces/adapters/IEggsAdapter.sol":"IEggsAdapter"},"evmVersion":"shanghai","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/",":erc4626-tests/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/erc4626-tests/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":halmos-cheatcodes/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/halmos-cheatcodes/src/",":openzeppelin-contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"src/interfaces/adapters/IEggsAdapter.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb8b994c7c032ce5328bebb75d15c3f9faf6ec099878fd395d03a06bed9f342ca","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d3705a5870671642a05ac9a1abadf440f5a4e85d071e5543361cc7da5f5334ec","dweb:/ipfs/QmUz7g2SPr5PjV4BgHKopaxq1QjZ9FWPpAzvGNL8WD3bP6"]}},"version":1}

params.user: Address of the account to query.

returns.eggsCollateral: Amount of EGGS tokens collateralized by the user.

params.user: Address of the account to query.

returns.sDebt: Amount of S borrowed by the user.

params.user: Address of the account to query.

params.sAmount: Amount of S to convert to EGGS.

returns.eggsMinted: Number of EGGS tokens minted for the caller.

returns.sAmount: Amount of S returned to the caller.

params.sAmount: Amount of S offered for repayment.

returns.repaid: The amount of S debt repaid.

borrowS(uint256).notice: Borrow S tokens using your EGGS as collateral. You need to have minted EGGS first. This will increase your debt

collateralOf(address).notice: Check how many EGGS tokens a user has as collateral

debtOf(address).notice: Check how much S a user has borrowed

eggsToken().notice: Get the EGGS token contract address

getBorrowApy().notice: Get the interest rate for borrowing S. This cost should be subtracted from your yield calculations

getSupplyApy().notice: Get the yield percentage for supplying S as collateral. Eggs might pay rewards to EGGS minters or share fees

healthFactor(address).notice: Check if a position is safe from liquidation. Above 1.0 is safe, below 1.0 might get liquidated

mintEggs(uint256).notice: Convert S tokens into EGGS tokens. Approve this adapter to spend your S first. Note: Eggs charges a minting fee (like 2.5%)

redeemEggs(uint256).notice: Convert EGGS tokens back to S tokens 1:1. Make sure to approve this adapter to spend your EGGS first

repayS(uint256).notice: Pay back borrowed S tokens to reduce your debt. Only pays back up to the amount you actually owe
